price: Ni na bo bemera ibyo (wowe Muhamadi) wahishuriwe (Qur’an n’imigenzo y’Intumwa), bakanemera ibyahishuwe mbere yawe (ibitabo byahishuriwe Intumwa zakubanjirije), ndetse bakemera imperuka badashidikanya.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ وَبِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yu'minūna bimā unzila ilayka wamā unzila min qablika wabil-ākhirati hum yūqinūna
